name: zakwest.tech
description: The source of the website residing at https://zakwest.tech

scripts.build: npm run build:server_js & npm run build:client_js & npm run build:veiws & npm run build:styles & npm run build:images & npm run build:data & npm run build:files
scripts.build:server_js: cp Source/Scripts/*.js Built/Scripts & cp Source/*.js Built
scripts.build:client_js: for file in Source/Public/js/*.js; do uglifyjs $file --output tmp/$file --compress --mangle; done && cp tmp/Source/Public/js/*.js Built/Public/js
scripts.prebuild:veiws: mkdir -p Built/Views && mkdir -p Built/Views/Layouts && mkdir -p Built/Views/Partials
scripts.build:veiws: cp Source/Views/*.handlebars Built/Views & cp Source/Views/Layouts/*.handlebars Built/Views/Layouts & cp Source/Views/Partials/*.handlebars Built/Views/Partials
scripts.prebuild:images: mkdir -p Built/Public/img && mkdir -p Built/Public/img/content && mkdir -p Built/Public/img/files && mkdir -p Built/Public/img/header
scripts.build:data: cp Source/Data/*.md Built/Data & for file in Source/Data/*.json; do uglifyjs --expr $file --output tmp/$file; done && cp tmp/Source/Data/*.json Built/Data

author: Zak West
